alert.note: Alert for Broward; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 16 at 12:22PM EST until January 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Broward County in southeastern Florida... Southeastern Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 100 PM EST. * At 1222 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Loxahatchee NWR to 7 miles north of Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 to 6 miles southwest of East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Coral Springs and Pompano Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southeastern Florida. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into a small central room in a sturdy structure. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southeastern Florida.
